channel.title: surface on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in surface on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Getting a M$ Surface for Lin
item.description: 17:38 Sunday 23 August 2015 JST She has really enjoyed her iPad, but can’t do real stuff on it, so we’re upgrading her tablet experience to Surface 3. (Though I don’t know if she chose the high end or low end version. I hope the high end one so it will hopefully be useful longer.)
